website_summaries.verdict: Sleek design with a universal fastening system for convenience.
pros: Universal clamps allow hammock to work on any type of table or desk, with either open or closed sides
The clamps ensure the hammock stays secure, feels stable, and retains adjustments
Comes with a free phone stand
cons: Some users prefer a padded sling

customer_reviews.title: Almost TOO good..
customer_reviews.text: This works in multiple positions and with multiple desks. I use mine daily. The quality is great and it looks sharp under my white desk. The only bump I ran into was first installing it, you need to tie a knot in the rope over the adjuster. This prevents the rope from slipping and lowering it when putting your feet on it. It's a great purchase and really makes a difference in my legs and feet. Although sometimes it may relax me a little too much because I have started to doze a few times while using this!
customer_reviews.author: Kendall Forsythe

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Exactly what I needed to replace my ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Exactly what I needed to replace my ugly cardboard box footrest. It looks so much cleaner under the table now and is more comfortable. Fits perfectly for my 5.5 feet table.
customer_reviews.author: AK

customer_reviews.title: I love this thing!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this hammock because it was the only one I found that offered universal installation AND positive reviews. I attached it to the holes in my work desk that are for cords and cables. It works perfectly!! Bonus awesomeness: I have a pinched sciatic nerve, and using this hammock provides the perfect stretch for the piriformis muscle. If you've had sciatic pain, you know this muscle. It's also inconspicuous under my desk, so it doesn't draw attention when I'm using it.
customer_reviews.author: AuntieD

customer_reviews.title: Works on corner stand up desk !
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. Ive been fighting to elevate my feet with an upside down trashcan & to my delight this is much better! easy to attach to the desk just using the clamp option and the strings holding the hammock do not slide at all (once I knotted the adjustable ends) 👍🏻👍🏻👍🏻
customer_reviews.author: MrsA2010

customer_reviews.title: Great Product! GREAT Customer Service!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item last year and had quite a few compliments on it. It was pretty easy to install. Just takes a little getting used to and trying to find the right height. I moved offices and unfortunately lost one of the clamps. I reached out to the customer service dept to see if they sold them individually. They replied back fairly quickly and advised that at that time they weren't selling the clamp separately, but that they were happy that I was so pleased with the product, and sent a brand new hammock, at NO cost! Being in a customer service role myself, I can certainly appreciate receiving good customer service. Thank you again for all your help!
customer_reviews.author: Bess LaMay

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome product for your desk. You can prop your feet up and enjoy some comfort on long days at the desk. It did take a day or so to get the right set up for it to hold correctly at the height I wanted after the weight of my feet went on it, but once I had it set to my desired height, it hasn't moved since. This is a steal.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Total junk won't hold
customer_reviews.text: The strong on this and the supposed method of tightening or loosening the footrest is garbage and will slide, thus unable to support my feet. Thanks for wasting my time and making my week uncomfortable as I now have to get a different product. Stuff of this obviously low quality should never be allowed on Amazon at these prices. Couldn't have cost more than a dollar to make and I paid twenty, not to mention wasted a few hours of my life.
customer_reviews.author: Brad W.

customer_reviews.title: Claps are good quality
customer_reviews.text: It's ok. The hooks on this brand are really strong, so if you can't decide don't buy rhe cheaper one, soend a little extra money on this, it's sturdier. The fabric could be cushioned for extended use. I sent it back because it didn't make much of a difference, I decided to go with an adjustable height desk instead to keep the circulation going.
customer_reviews.author: Daisy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The product came very nicely boxed with all the needed instruction inside. The legs hammock is very well put together and it is made of a high quality material. The hooks are practical and the instruction book that came in the box makes it very easy to install of any desk. I am attaching some photos, maybe it would be useful for some of you. I highly recommend this office feet rester. For sure I will purchase some extras as Xmas gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian

customer_reviews.title: I took a gamble with this item and I’m glad I did.
customer_reviews.text: This product is brilliant. The solution I found for hooking the Foot Hammock gives me the opportunity to stretch my legs when I work. I’ve tried a few of these items from different vendors but was unsatisfied because Most of them didn’t have an acceptable mounting option for my particular office desk setup, until now. The unprecedented Foot Hammock by 5fold products has easy hooks on the sides, which are versatile and are perfect for my particular situation. Now, the extra hours will be more enjoyable 🙂 I am very excited about this product from all points of view. Best regards
customer_reviews.author: E

customer_reviews.title: Save your money.
customer_reviews.text: Terrible product. Supposedly its supposed to be “dual stitched” this thing ripped a month after use. My $8 one that I bought 2 years ago lasted me longer, sure wish I had bought more than one. Definitely not worth the price. Also, the little “clips” are also useless, as they don’t prevent the hammock from sliding down.
customer_reviews.author: Fisnik Guri

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it unless your legs are twigs.
customer_reviews.text: Don’t put any weight on it, it will fall apart. It’s very weak. Mine fell apart after a few months. I will say they included some extra parts, which was nice, but none could repair it.
customer_reviews.author: ianoid

customer_reviews.title: Installed and ready for use in seconds
customer_reviews.text: I was concerned about how difficult will be installing this foot hammock, however, it took me a few minutes and I did it all alone, no husband help was needed here! Now really, I’m not a handywoman, but this tool came with an installation guide, so easy and clear that even for me was a piece of cake to understand the instructions. My husband is also in love with the product and is always stealing my desk seat, just to rock his legs in the foot hammock. Luckily it’s easy to adjust. Happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: livia giurgiu

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Dislike this, uncomfortable, poor support and bad instructions, those strings don’t work and are difficult to use/adjust which is what provides the necessary support
customer_reviews.author: Wen

customer_reviews.title: BEST THING EVER FOR OFFICE!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a foot rest for my corner cube and this works perfectly! I've been able to install it in multiple locations and it works great! Easy to use, easy to install and adjust.
customer_reviews.author: AJA

customer_reviews.title: Helps relieve stiff legs from working on a computer all day!
customer_reviews.text: OMG - this is AWESOME! I usually use foot rests, but this is sooo much better! It's only 1-2 inches above my foot rest, but this gives me the flexibility to have two different foot positions and takes pressure off my thighs/calves. I started getting varicose veins and I'm anticipating this would help improve them.
customer_reviews.author: Len

customer_reviews.title: It was easy to install and worked with my type of desk
customer_reviews.text: I always prop my feet up on my computer tower- this helps so that I don’t have to do that anymore! It was easy to install and worked with my type of desk!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa S.

customer_reviews.title: Who doesn't like hammocks.
customer_reviews.text: Who doesn't like hammocks. Till this day I have never been on one that is not comfortable. The only problem is we cannot always be on one....especially at work. Well now there might a solution to that. I work on a computer for a majority of the day, where I try to get up and move around every now and then. Now I can incorporate this into my routine and be more comfortable during the infamous zoom conferences popular nowadays :)
customer_reviews.author: Marco M

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: Everyone at work now calls me extra but I just sit back with my feet propped but in my foot hammock and it’s hard to even care. Works as advertised and it’s nice not to have to prop my feet up on my garage can anymore
customer_reviews.author: Meeshee

customer_reviews.title: The hammock is just great! Well made
customer_reviews.text: The hammock is just great! Well made, sturdy and easy to mount on all kinds of desks. I mounted it in a couple of minutes. My feet are happy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend for people that owns an ikea desk
customer_reviews.text: Would not recommend for people that owns an ikea desk. Unless you're planning to use the screws (Which i personally didn't like doing) if you're willing to do that. They should really specify the mounting stand of how many inches of it.
customer_reviews.author: Dinden

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't hold
customer_reviews.text: This product is nice but the rope doesn't hold sithe taughtness doesn't stay. It keeps sliding and loosening. I tied knots in the rope but it isn't ideal.
customer_reviews.author: Krista

customer_reviews.title: Easy to hook up
customer_reviews.text: Love this under my desk. And allows me to raise my feet and take the pressure off my lower back. Super easy to hook up.
customer_reviews.author: A. Daley

customer_reviews.title: Really great, but can definitely be upgraded.
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is awesome, and I definitely use this a lot when I watch a movie or show. Only knocked it one star because it is a bit tedious to adjust, and because if it were made out of wrapped paracord like a traditional hammock it would probably be a bit more comfortable since it's not quite form fitting.
customer_reviews.author: Brett Stepherson

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised, very easy to install
customer_reviews.text: I like it and it works great but it does collect a ton of lint since it is a black fabric that is a lint collecting fabric. But luckily it’s up high enough on my desk but nobody really sees it except for me when I’m using it. I wish it had a little more padding.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Vacation for your Feet.
customer_reviews.text: Give your feet a break. I work from home and my legs have been aching and soar. This convenient gadget has allowed me to stay at my desk for longer periods of time and also work more consistent. Plus is keeps my legs elevated and I can sit in better positions for my body and back. Give it a try and see what you have been missing in your daily office work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable, i installed it in my office
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, I installed it in my office and thanks for the extra stuff that came with it
customer_reviews.author: Hamad E. Mohamed

customer_reviews.title: Hate to sit at a desk without it!
customer_reviews.text: I really like mine and definitely miss it if I am sitting at one of my other desks that doesn't have it. Only issue I had was my rope stoppers didn't seem to want to stop it very well but with minor adjusting it's exactly how I want it and I am very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: cute and it works!
customer_reviews.text: so far so good. I’ve had it for a week and use it under my desk at my office- it looks super cute and really helps alleviate leg soreness during long work days. will update if this changes any in the next few months!
customer_reviews.author: Lu.

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I set this up under my desk at work & it works great. Only thing I would suggest is for more support on the actual material. I get inflammation on my calves so sometimes resting them on there was at times uncomfortable so if there was more padding it would be perfect.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: Ropes don't hold on place so can't support feet. Cheap junk of a product.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product. Makes my days working at home so much more comfortable. It came in a very nice package with a couple extra pieces and was easy to install. It took a few days to get it adjusted just how I wanted but it is exactly what I was looking for. Would definitely recommend!

customer_reviews.title: This foot hammock is amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I was very happy with this product and it’s still usable! The only problem I have is that the string snapped. I just tied it into a knot and it’s still fine. I only gave 3 stars because I know that I inevitably will have to get a new one soon lol

customer_reviews.title: Good quality easy set up
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my boyfriend and he likes it so far. Very easy set up only took a few minutes. Clamps are padded to protect your desk. Seems to be good quality. So far no complaints.

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with the quality
customer_reviews.text: Got this to replace another foot hammock we had that broke in two seconds. This one has held up! Very happy with the quality!!

customer_reviews.title: super wobbly

customer_reviews.title: the product is the best tool for anybody
customer_reviews.text: Leg saver!!! For a pregnant woman, this Foot Hammock is a blessing. My legs really deflate when I use the Foot Hammock. I set it up all aby my own on the kitchen table. Thank you very much, the product is the best tool for anybody, it makes you simply relax.

customer_reviews.title: Worked for 3 hours - then broke
customer_reviews.text: It was nice while it worked. I was able to set it up for different desk configurations. Worked for 3 hours - then broke. The black plastic "rope stopper" snapped and flew off. My feet aren't that heavy!

customer_reviews.title: Nice Concept
customer_reviews.text: I like the concept of this foot hammock but I don't use mine very often because of the type of desk I have. If you have a desk with a back underneath, then you won't be able to stretch your legs out.

customer_reviews.title: This is amazing. It worked on my desk that does not ...
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing. It worked on my desk that does not have open sides. I am so much more comfortable now. Totally worth the price.

customer_reviews.title: Works great on my desk at work
customer_reviews.text: Works great on my desk at work. I'm pretty short, so it's nice to finally have a foot rest. I do wish there was a better locking mechanism on the ropes - my boots are pretty heavy and until I knotted the ropes, the hammock kept slipping down.

customer_reviews.text: I added this to my gaming desk and I really like it. I put alot of downward force on it and it holds up fine.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Very comfortable for tired or painful feet! Very useful for short people when their feet don't reach the floor. Great quality and fits all tables. I recommend it! 👍🏼

customer_reviews.text: Super ,I like it since I work long hours sitting at the office my feet get tired. Thi keeps your feet in a relax position. I would recommend it for al office people out there.

product_meta.title: Foot Hammock Under Desk | Adjustable Desk Foot Rest Hammock Office | Under The Desk Hammock for Feet Suitable for All Desk Types & Bonus Included by 5fold Products (Black)
feature_bullets: UNIVERSAL FIT – Wondering if a desk foot hammock can work on your desk? For your comfort, our desk hammock was designed to be installable on any type of desk with open or closed sides (Cubicle/Corner Office/L-Shaped Desk).

HEALTHY - Feet hammock under desk are footrests that support your comfortable and correct position while sitting at your desk. Desk hammock for feet improves your health, as it`s viable to prevent Back, Foot, Hip and Feet pain and increase poor blood circulation.

HIGH ADJUSTABLE - Each of us is different, and to satisfy your needs, we have crafted the high adjustable under desk leg hammock. Enjoy extra back and forth adjustability, with customizable desk leg hammock height, with no limit in place.

IMPROVES CIRCULATION - Foot hammock under desk turns long hours of sitting at the desk into a relaxation session. Check out a foot rest hammock and relax by increasing your comfort level. Take the foot hammock portable home or at the office, simple and easy to use and install.

NO RISKS - LIFETIME GUARANTEE and MONEY BACK policy, no questions asked. GET your underdesk foot hammock TODAY! Plus enjoy our BONUS Phone Stand and Headphone Holder that comes with the well-packed foot rest hammock. WHAT ARE YOU WAITING FOR? BUY NOW!
